meanings.definition: Imagineers (noun): A group of creative individuals who design and develop new concepts and ideas.
meanings.sent1: The imagineers gathered to brainstorm ideas for the new theme park.
meanings.sent2: The imagineers presented their innovative designs to the company executives.
meanings.sent3: The imagineers decided to create a magical world filled with talking animals.
meanings.sent4: The imagineers' minds were like a treasure trove of endless imagination.
meanings.sent5: The imagineers' creativity knew no bounds as they brought their visions to life.

meanings.definition: Imagineers (verb): To use creativity and innovation to envision and create something new.
meanings.sent1: She imagineers a future where technology solves all our problems.
meanings.sent2: They imagineer a world where everyone lives in harmony.
meanings.sent3: He imagineers a world where cats can talk and dance.
meanings.sent4: Their minds imagineer possibilities beyond our wildest dreams.
meanings.sent5: The children imagineer fantastical adventures in their backyard.
